name: Activation PR
tag_list: public-relations, media-communications, communication, press-release, journalism, communication-management
overview: Activation PR is a Public Relations firm specialized in media communications and communication management. Composed of a dynamic team of qualified PR consultants, Activation PR uses innovative methods to bring about the desired results. They are currently pioneers in the field of PR management for small and medium-sized businesses by exploring effective strategies requiring fewer resources whilst still maximising results.
